edge: Jan Pinkava came up with the concept for the film in 2000 and created the original design, sets and characters and core storyline.
By 2004, Pixar added Bob Peterson as a co-director and he was given exclusive control of the story.
After three months and lacking confidence in the story development, Pixar management turned to The Incredibles director Brad Bird to direct the film.
Jan Pinkava departed Pixar in 2005 while Peterson left the film to return to work on Up.
